```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(tidybayes)
my_seed <- 99
set.seed(my_seed)
```

# Read data

```{r}
msa_models <- readRDS("./data/analyses/msa_models.rds") %>%
  mutate(
    outcome = as.factor(outcome),
    typicality = as.factor(typicality)
  ) %>%
  droplevels()
contrasts(msa_models$outcome) <- "contr.sum"
contrasts(msa_models$typicality) <- "contr.sum"
```

# Meta-analysis

```{r}
priors <- c(
  prior(normal(0, 1), class = Intercept),
  prior(normal(0, 1), class = b),
  prior(cauchy(0, 1), class = sd)
)

meta_bm <- brm(
  estimate | se(se) ~
    outcome + typicality +
    (1 | model_id),
  data = msa_models,
  prior = priors,
  chain = 4,
  seed = my_seed,
  cores = 4,
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  threads = threading(2),
  file = "./data/meta_analysis/meta_bm.rds"
)
```

```{r}
meta_bm
```

```{r}
plot(conditional_effects(meta_bm), ask = FALSE)
```

```{r}
meta_bm %>%
  spread_draws(b_Intercept, r_model_id[model,]) %>%
  mutate(model_mean = b_Intercept + r_model_id) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = reorder(model, model_mean), x = model_mean)) +
  stat_halfeye()
```
